channel.title: Below-Zero
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i46.tinypic.com/2n6ga43.jpg[/img][/center]
[b][i][size=14pt]Server Info:[/size][/i][/b] Below-Zero is a Server That will be based on the 317 Version of RuneScape. This Server will Have most 474 Features but put into a 317 Version. This Server Will have many Features like many minigames and skills. The Skills on Below-Zero will All be Close to the way Runescapes skills were on the 317 Version. This Server i am planning on haveing alot of big things and minigames runned on Grahams Event manager. Also my goal is to load all 474 items on the client for good pking items. Also This Server was Officially started on 4/8/10.
[b][i][size=14pt]Updates[/size][/i][/b] ( Server and Client Updates )
1. - Fixed Walking and Running Lag. (4/8/10) 2. - Changed The name of the Server When you log in, Its now "Welcome to Below-Zero" (4/8/10) 3. - Loaded Headicons For the Client. (4/9/10) 4. - Re did the chat box on the Client. (4/9/10) 5. - Got new emote Tab and Got all emotes to work properly besides "Scared" and "Rabit" and "Skill Cape" No Toolips (4/9/10) 6. - Added New Magic Tabs Regular And Acient / 474 look. Toollips Added. (4/9/10) 7. - Also i Added 508 ignore and Friends Lists. No Toolips. (4/9/10) 8. - Added Prayer. No Toolips. (4/9/10) 9. - Started Cleaning out ActionButtons.java. (4/9/10) 10. - Started working on all Teleports Modern and Ancient. Finished (4/10/10) 11. - Loaded all 474 items. (4/11/10) 12. - Added Membership. (4/11/10)
[b][i][size=14pt]More information:[/size][/i][/b] As i get more into the project this project thread will change. i will add spawns on here and minigames. But as right now im just getting the server and client set up. Anyone who wants to help find bugs leave your name and stuff and i will send you the client so you can log on and look around. This server i am not gonna realse for beta for a long time till i have everything i want. I am planning on haveing this done in a couple mounths or longer. This server will also have many good features so stay tuned. Please leave some comments and please do not flame my thread.
[b][i][size=14pt]Minigames:[/size][/i][/b]
- Dueling 0% - Fight Caves 0% - Fight Pits 0% - Duel Arena 0% - Pest Control 0% - Castle Wars 0% - Barrows 0% - Barbarian Assault 0%
[b][i][size=14pt]Media:[/size][/i][/b] [center]
[img]http://i43.tinypic.com/1g4rix.jpg[/img][/center] [center]
[img]http://i40.tinypic.com/153pgk8.jpg[/img][/center] [center]
[img]http://i44.tinypic.com/eukdpd.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://i41.tinypic.com/inhbhi.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://i42.tinypic.com/2z3pf12.jpg[/img][/center]

item.description:

Those are minigames, like i said i will be starting those last, i am working on all the little stuff first and then the big stuff it only makes sense.

item.title: Below-Zero
item.dc:creator: @gurlz gurlz
item.description:
@gurlz wrote:

[center][/center]

[size=14pt]Server Info:[/size] Below-Zero is a Server That will be based on the 317 Version of RuneScape. This Server will Have most 474 Features but put into a 317 Version. This Server Will have many Features like many minigames and skills. The Skills on Below-Zero will All be Close to the way Runescapes skills were on the 317 Version. This Server i am planning on haveing alot of big things and minigames runned on Grahams Event manager. Also my goal is to load all 474 items on the client for good pking items. Also This Server was Officially started on 4/8/10.

[size=14pt]Updates[/size] ( Server and Client Updates )

    • Fixed Walking and Running Lag. (4/8/10)
    • Changed The name of the Server When you log in, Its now “Welcome to Below-Zero” (4/8/10)
    • Loaded Headicons For the Client. (4/9/10)
    • Re did the chat box on the Client. (4/9/10)
    • Got new emote Tab and Got all emotes to work properly besides “Scared” and “Rabit” and “Skill Cape” No Toolips (4/9/10)
    • Added New Magic Tabs Regular And Acient / 474 look. Toollips Added. (4/9/10)
    • Also i Added 508 ignore and Friends Lists. No Toolips. (4/9/10)
    • Added Prayer. No Toolips. (4/9/10)
    • Started Cleaning out ActionButtons.java. (4/9/10)
    • Started working on all Teleports Modern and Ancient. Finished (4/10/10)
    • Loaded all 474 items. (4/11/10)
    • Added Membership. (4/11/10)

[size=14pt]More information:[/size] As i get more into the project this project thread will change. i will add spawns on here and minigames. But as right now im just getting the server and client set up. Anyone who wants to help find bugs leave your name and stuff and i will send you the client so you can log on and look around. This server i am not gonna realse for beta for a long time till i have everything i want. I am planning on haveing this done in a couple mounths or longer. This server will also have many good features so stay tuned. Please leave some comments and please do not flame my thread.

[size=14pt]Minigames:[/size]

  • Dueling 0%
  • Fight Caves 0%
  • Fight Pits 0%
  • Duel Arena 0%
  • Pest Control 0%
